approach: Implement Agent2Agent protocol endpoints. Allow agents to register capabilities and discover each other. Reference: mcp-gateway-registry A2A implementation.
impact: Enables true agent-to-agent communication through our platform.

approach: Add FAISS index + sentence-transformers for /v1/discover. Replace keyword matching with vector similarity. Reference: mcp-gateway-registry uses FAISS + all-MiniLM-L6-v2.
impact: Dramatically better search results, closes biggest feature gap.

approach: Add OAuth2 support alongside API keys. Consider Keycloak or Auth0 integration.
